name: The Eye of the Beheld
description:
The Eye of the Beheld

Jiqiren, a cyborg living during a war far in the future, takes a hit for a soldier in General Adria's army. The soft-hearted general comes to talk to the injured team member, and learns about why Jiqiren boarded Adria's ship in the first place.

Details:

  • Submission for the 2020 Shoot for the Stars game jam
  • Kinetic visual novel
  • 1,000 word script
  • 3 full illustrations

Writing, art, and illustrations done by nyanbacon. Donate to her ko-fi here.

Background shading and main menu space expanse done by DeviantArt user JellySnek
